mapper.select: SELECT tp.p_idx as pIdx, tp.uidx as uIdx, tp.fidx as fIdx, tp.state as qaState, tp.start_time, tp.end_time as endTime, tf.fname as originName, tp.qa_type as qaType, tp.file_format as fileType, tp.err_file_dir as errdirectory, tp.err_file_name as errFileName, tp.comment as comment FROM tb_progress tp left join public.tb_file tf on tp.fidx = tf.fid WHERE p_idx = #{pid}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_progress(uidx, qa_type, file_format, state, start_time, fidx) values(#{uIdx}, #{qaType}, #{fileType}, #{qaState}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{fIdx})
select currval('tb_progress_p_idx_seq')
mapper.select: update tb_progress set state = #{qaState}, comment = #{comment} where p_idx = #{pIdx}
mapper.insert: update tb_progress set err_file_dir = #{errdirectory}, err_file_name = #{errFileName}, end_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where p_idx = #{pIdx}
